author: slowmoyang
body:
I referred to cmssw/Validation/MuonGEMRecHits/src/GEMRecHitsValidation.cc

simhit / rechit matching condition is to check whether a fired strip by simhit is in a rec. cluster.
Clusters may overlap. In that case, I select first cluster.

The local position of simhit is used to get fired strip by simhit.
Fired strips by simhit start from 0 but Fired strips by rechit start from 1.
title: GEMCosmicMuonSim Part
